item.description:
Time and meeting location to be determined

 

http://www.bostonderbydames.com

 

Buy Tickets:

http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/308828

 

Cost: General admission (adult)$16.00 

If you do it well in advance you can have them mailed to you. 

 

BDD presents: Massacre & B-Party 2013 Season Game 2

ROLLER DERBY DOUBLEHEADER!

Saturday April 27, 2013

Boston Massacre vs. Mass Maelstrom (Men's Roller Derby)
Boston B-Party vs. TBD

General admission tickets are $16 for adults, $12 for kids 6-13. Kids under 6 admitted free! Trackside seating tickets are $25 and get you the best seats in the house, closest to the action! All tickets include admission to both games, and admission to the after party on the premisis!

Doors at 4:00pm
5:00 First game
7:00 Second game

Shriner's Auditorium in Wilmington, MA
99 Fordham Rd, Wilmington, MA 01887

After the games, head on over to the Fez Room to see the MVP awards presented and to get down with the Dames on the dance floor!

More info at www.BostonDerbyDames.com

Deet's: No refunds or exchanges, sorry!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Derby Dames- Womens Roller Derby
